      • releaseAllServices

        public void releaseAllServices()
        Description copied from interface: ServiceManager
        Stops and releases all services. After this method is called no further services can be requested. An IllegalStateException will be thrown in this case.
        Specified by:
        releaseAllServices in interface ServiceManager
